job_tasks.phrase: explore the intersection of generative AI and MPC, developing new techniques and methodologies
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to exploring and developing new methods for AI models, which falls under the core definition of modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: design & execute a technical AI roadmap towards bridging the gap between AI and confidential computing
job_tasks.justification: Designing a technical roadmap for AI development and implementation indicates a focus on the strategic development of AI models.

job_tasks.phrase: work closely with our cryptography team, getting up to speed with the technical nuances & implementing AI models accordingly
job_tasks.justification: This indicates the practical implementation of AI models, specifically adapting them to new paradigms.

job_tasks.phrase: adapt AI model architectures to work in a performant way under a confidential computing paradigm and technically implement these architectures in our AI toolkit
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly describes modifying and implementing AI model architectures, which is a key aspect of modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: report to Nillion's AI Product Lead
job_tasks.justification: Reporting to a product lead suggests an alignment with product strategy and business goals.

job_tasks.phrase: integrate their feedback in our AI roadmap
job_tasks.justification: Integrating feedback into a roadmap is a software development process that impacts the direction and evolution of AI tools.

job_tasks.phrase: actively contribute to creating easy-to-use AI tools and suitable AI development workflows
job_tasks.justification: Creating AI tools and workflows involves software development principles for usability and efficiency.

soft_skills.phrase: in close collaboration with our AI and cryptography team
You will have regular touchpoints with AI developers
getting up to speed with the technical nuances
developing new techniques and methodologies that allow for secure, distributed AI computations
design & execute a technical AI roadmap

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes working with 'generative AI models' and 'adapting AI model architectures'. It also mentions developing 'easy-to-use AI tools' and workflows, aligning directly with the core responsibilities and projects of a GenAI Engineer focused on building user-facing applications and systems powered by generative models.
